name: Vegan Chilaquiles with Chickpeas Recipe
description: Vegan Chilaquiles with spiced Chickpeas. Spiced Chickpeas and crisped tortilla with easy red sauce. Easy Chilaquiles Recipe. Nut-free, soy-free. can be gluten-free with gluten0free chips or tortillas.
recipeIngredient: 15 oz can Chickpeas (garbanzo beans, or 1.5 cups cooked)
chopped red onion (cilantro and lime juice for garnish)
half of the onion garlic mixture from above

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, carrots and a pinch of salt and cook until golden. 4 to 6 mins. Stir occasionally. Reserve half of the mixture for the red sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, carrots and a pinch of salt and cook until golden. 4 to 6 mins. Stir occasionally. Reserve half of the mixture for the red sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chickpeas and spices to the skillet (or use 1 tbsp or more taco seasoning or chili powder blend of choice ). Mix well, Cover and cook for 4 to 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chickpeas and spices to the skillet (or use 1 tbsp or more taco seasoning or chili powder blend of choice ). Mix well, Cover and cook for 4 to 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile make the red sauce: Blend all the ingredients and reserved onion garlic carrot mixture until smooth in a blender and set aside. (You can also make the sauce with red salsa, chipotle pepper, cumin, salt and water as needed).
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile make the red sauce: Blend all the ingredients and reserved onion garlic carrot mixture until smooth in a blender and set aside. (You can also make the sauce with red salsa, chipotle pepper, cumin, salt and water as needed).

recipeInstructions.text: Add tortilla chips or crisped sliced tortillas to the chickpea skillet. *
recipeInstructions.name: Add tortilla chips or crisped sliced tortillas to the chickpea skillet. *

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the blended sauce over them. mix and bring to boil. Taste and adjust salt and heat and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the blended sauce over them. mix and bring to boil. Taste and adjust salt and heat and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately garnished with chopped onion, cilantro, and a dash of lime juice. Add other garnishes like avocado or vegan sour cream/vegan queso etc.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately garnished with chopped onion, cilantro, and a dash of lime juice. Add other garnishes like avocado or vegan sour cream/vegan queso etc.
